name: Therminic 2018
content: THERMINIC is the major European Workshop for thermal issues in electronic components and systems. For academics and industrialists involved in both micro and power electronics this annual event promises to be a very special occasion with a high quality technical program and exciting social events. We invite delegates to consider submitting abstracts that are related to, but not limited to, the following topics: • Thermal Phenomena, Simulation and Experiment • Electronics Cooling Concepts • Thermo-Mechanical Reliability
